item.title: IO Interactive Showcase set for June 6
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/io-interactive-showcase-set-for-june-6

Featuring HITMAN World of Assassination, 007 First Light, MindsEye, and more.

IO Interactive will host the first ever IO Interactive Showcase on June 6 at 6:00 p.m. PT / 9:00 p.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast will feature information on the following titles:

  • HITMAN World of Assassination – With the HITMAN franchise set to celebrate its 25th Anniversary this year, announcements regarding upcoming content for HITMAN World of Assassination and collaborations around the HITMAN franchise will be shared.
  • MindsEye – Developed by Build A Rocket Boy and published by IOI Partners, MindsEye is a narrative-driven action–adventure thriller, and will be an ever-expanding player experience, with new studio-created premium content delivered monthly. MindsEye will launch on June 10, 2025.
  • 007 First Light – Developed by IO Interactive, 007 First Light is the title of its highly anticipated standalone original James Bond video game, set to be revealed this week.
  • Additional Surprises – Fans can also look forward to additional surprises and special guests throughout the show in celebration of IO Interactive’s abundant future.

“This event celebrates our 25-years history with the HITMAN franchise and shares an in-depth look at the diverse future of our studio,” said IO Interactive CEO Hakan Abrak in a press release. “We’ve prepared some truly exciting surprises.”

Stay tuned.

ATLUS has released the third and final “Principles of RAIDOU” trailer for RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army, this time introducing the game’s story and characters.

RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 19. Read more about the game here, here, and here.
